title: Amazon Link Cleaner
description: A simple and efficient tool for cleaning Amazon product links by removing tracking parameters and affiliate tags.

title: BananaSlug Emulator
description: A complete emulator for a custom RISC-style architecture, featuring a CPU, GPU, memory management, and ROM loading. It is written in C++17 and uses SDL2 for graphics output.

title: Baseball Stats MCP Server
description: A Model Context Protocol server that provides access to baseball statistics and data through AI assistants.

title: BingeFlix Backend
description: The backend service for BingeFlix, providing movie recommendations, user management, and streaming availability data.

title: Dino Game on Basys3
description: A simplified version of the Chrome Dinosaur Game implemented on a Basys3 FPGA board with hardware modules for the dinosaur character, obstacles, and display drivers.

title: Distributed Task Queue System
description: A distributed task queue system with production-ready reliability patterns including retries, circuit breakers, and monitoring.

title: Easy Wireshark
description: An LLM-powered network traffic analyzer that uses Wireshark's tshark command-line tool to capture and analyze network traffic in a user-friendly way.

title: Image Classification Project
description: An image classification pipeline using PyTorch with custom dataset handling, ResNet-50 model training, and functionality for data preprocessing and prediction.

title: Intermediate Representation Compiler
description: A compiler implementation with intermediate representation components for the CSE110A course, including parsing, optimization, and code generation.

title: OpenBiomechanics Baseball Injury Risk Assessment System
description: A machine learning system for assessing baseball injury risk through biomechanical analysis and predictive modeling.

title: Real-Time Drawing Board Backend
description: The backend for a collaborative real-time drawing platform built with Django and Django Channels, managing user interactions and WebSocket synchronization.

title: Scholarly Research MCP Server
description: A consolidated research tool that helps find and analyze academic papers from PubMed, Google Scholar, ArXiv, and JSTOR through AI-powered search capabilities.
